vote.description: vote is the vote with given proposal_id and voter.

QueryVoteByProposalVoterResponse.title: Query Vote By Proposal Voter Response
QueryVoteByProposalVoterResponse.description: QueryVoteByProposalVoterResponse is the Query/VoteByProposalVoter response type.

proposal_id.description: proposal is the unique ID of the proposal.

voter.description: voter is the account address of the voter.

option.title: Vote Option
option.description: VoteOption enumerates the valid vote options for a given proposal.

metadata.description: metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the vote. the recommended format of the metadata is to be found here: https://docs.cosmos.network/v0.47/modules/group#vote-2

submit_time.description: submit_time is the timestamp when the vote was submitted.

cosmos.group.v1.Vote.title: Vote
cosmos.group.v1.Vote.description: Vote represents a vote for a proposal.string metadata
